Posts.Content: Katie55 wrote: Hi All, I had a R full mastectomy on Thurs. Jan. 25. The drain was removed Mon. Jan 29 and everything appears to be healing well. I have had very little pain but a LOT of itching. The nurse replaced my bandage when she removed the drain, but now I have noticed some of the steri-strips are sticking out under the bandage and they are not adhering. I have not had a proper shower yet, and hoped to have one this morning but I am afraid if I do everything will fall off and I don't know if the incision is fully healed yet.
